title: Why should I get Karthus
body: Need reasons to convince me. Calling me a faggot for wanting to choose karthus is perfectly acceptable.

replies.body:
If you are happy to farm up for the first part of the game (this is quite easy with {{champion:30}} abilities) Karthus is ideal for you. He then starts to REK in team-fights with his aoe slow and E. For me at least he feels kinda clunky so I don't play him. People really underestimate his damage output especially when he dies. If you play him just for the ult though, he will get boring pretty quick. 

Also great in ARAM as he can push waves well and can catch people out.
You should try Sseth's 900 ELO Spawn Karthus build, it's probably the best thing in the entire game.

Play Karthus, 

Buy Banshee, GA and Zhonya for maximum flashiness as you dive into the heat of the teamfight, at the front line.

And press ulti to give all enemy players a good scare when you finally kick the bucket.
playing karthus for the hope that one day there will be a team fight which will lead the whole enemy team down to low health giving you the option to use your ult for some awesome insta-penta kill XD
